channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware Workstation and Fusion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware Workstation and Fusion

item.title: CVE-2018-6983|2024-08-05T06:17:17.413Z -- vmware -- vmware%20workstation%20and%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation (15.x before 15.0.2 and 14.x before 14.1.5) and Fusion (11.x before 11.0.2 and 10.x before 10.1.5) contain an integer overflow vulnerability in the virtual network devices. This issue may allow a guest to execute code on the host.
